html: #RI needs strong, safe, resilient water and coastal infrastructure to protect us from threats like hurricanes and sea level rise, and to keep commerce flowing in our economy. As a member of @EPWDems, I worked hard to produce a strong #WRDA.
text: #RI needs strong, safe, resilient water and coastal infrastructure to protect us from threats like hurricanes and sea level rise, and to keep commerce flowing in our economy. As a member of @EPWDems, I worked hard to produce a strong #WRDA.

html: If @FERC votes on electricity rates end in a tie, the proposed rates go into effect automatically with no input from the American people. My bill with @SenMarkey & @SenWarren will let the public protest a rate change even if the commission vote is a tie. It’s in #WRDA too.
text: If @FERC votes on electricity rates end in a tie, the proposed rates go into effect automatically with no input from the American people. My bill with @SenMarkey & @SenWarren will let the public protest a rate change even if the commission vote is a tie. It’s in #WRDA too.

html: The 2018 #WRDA also includes the SRF WIN Act, a bill I cosponsored that creates a new financing mechanism for water infrastructure.
text: The 2018 #WRDA also includes the SRF WIN Act, a bill I cosponsored that creates a new financing mechanism for water infrastructure.

html: Another of my provisions requires the Corps to speed up completion of two important #RI projects: dredging the Providence River and the assessment of the flood risk to #RhodeIsland’s historical structures.
text: Another of my provisions requires the Corps to speed up completion of two important #RI projects: dredging the Providence River and the assessment of the flood risk to #RhodeIsland’s historical structures.

html: In the 2016 #WRDA, I was successful in including a provision to expand the Corps’ authority to remove debris from the nation’s waterways. The 2018 WRDA requires the agency to update Congress on how it has used this authority, and make recommendations for potential projects.
text: In the 2016 #WRDA, I was successful in including a provision to expand the Corps’ authority to remove debris from the nation’s waterways. The 2018 WRDA requires the agency to update Congress on how it has used this authority, and make recommendations for potential projects.

html: It was the way things were done there at the time; I knew it was to make me get better; I knew it was just for a day/two; I knew my parents loved me; the nurses were kind & caring. Even in those best-case circumstances, that memory is still clear in my mind nearly 60 years later.

html: When I was four, my parents left me in a hospital in South Africa to have my tonsils out. I have few memories of those very early years. html: She even provided real evidence, including prior consistent statements, to corroborate her account. We then learned the true measure of #Kavanaugh. His bitter, partisan conspiracy theories ought to disqualify any nominee to the bench, let alone to the highest court in the land.

html: Then came credible allegations of sexual assault against #Kavanaugh, and remarkable testimony from Dr. Blasey Ford. She was calm, composed, and utterly believable. @realDonaldTrump called her testimony ‘credible’ and ‘compelling,’ as did many of my #Republican colleagues.

Also, he sides – nine times out of ten – with big #Republican corporate and special interests over regular Americans. Our next justice needs to remain independent of those interests; Judge #Kavanaugh signaled the opposite. That cost him my vote.

html: “No matter how much therapy and time goes by, one small statement or physical interaction can trigger someone who has experienced a traumatic assault.”
text: “No matter how much therapy and time goes by, one small statement or physical interaction can trigger someone who has experienced a traumatic assault.”

html: “The past few weeks have been doubly difficult with Dr. Ford coming forward and all of the constant news threads and social media threads. I have been triggered with nightmares, fear of being alone, and emotionally wrecked, PTSD and triggers are real.”pic.twitter.com/gfbRLsdG7P
text: “The past few weeks have been doubly difficult with Dr. Ford coming forward and all of the constant news threads and social media threads. I have been triggered with nightmares, fear of being alone, and emotionally wrecked, PTSD and triggers are real.”pic.twitter.com/gfbRLsdG7P

html: “As a rape survivor (I was 19 years old-I am now 66 years old) I want you to know that that experience does color the rest of a person's life, informing decisions that you make, where & how you go somewhere, how you raise your children & relate to your husband & all other people”pic.twitter.com/PpfnQM7zrR
text: “As a rape survivor (I was 19 years old-I am now 66 years old) I want you to know that that experience does color the rest of a person's life, informing decisions that you make, where & how you go somewhere, how you raise your children & relate to your husband & all other people”pic.twitter.com/PpfnQM7zrR

html: “I'm sure my rapist hasn't thought of me since that night 21 years ago either. In fact, he like Kavanaugh would likely deny anything had ever happened, but here's the thing about rape- the victims never forget."

html: Businesses are coming up with innovative ways to take #carbonpollution out of the air & put it to use. #Carbonutilization is a growing sector in states like #RhodeIsland. The spending bill includes my provision pushing @ENERGY to spend $12 million to continue R&D.
text:
Businesses are coming up with innovative ways to take #carbonpollution out of the air & put it to use. #Carbonutilization is a growing sector in states like #RhodeIsland. 

The spending bill includes my provision pushing @ENERGY to spend $12 million to continue R&D.

html: In a bipartisan effort, Sen. @MikeCrapo & I worked on an amendment which will provide $20M to create a DOE pilot program to recycle spent fuel. @ENERGY estimated dealing w our existing nuclear waste could cost as much as $100B; this amndt could help alleviate some of that burden.

html: The standards would save American motorists $1.7 trillion over the life of their vehicles, and reduce the pollution driving climate change and dirtying our air in downwind states like #RhodeIsland. The companies had the technology to do it. It was going to be a win-win.
text:
The standards would save American motorists $1.7 trillion over the life of their vehicles, and reduce the pollution driving climate change and dirtying our air in downwind states like #RhodeIsland. 

The companies had the technology to do it.  It was going to be a win-win.
